description:
I really love viewer participation. It's a lot of fun when a viewer writes in and expresses interest in being in a movie.

Alexander wrote us a while back and included a few photos of himself. I was definitely interested in getting him out because he's hot and he has a huge dick! The only catch was that he lives in England...

It took some arranging, but he had some time off coming. So, we flew him out for a visit.

Riley had been away with a broken arm. After it had healed, we invited him out to give Alexander a good fucking.

The two of them hit it off pretty quickly. Riley pounded Alexander's ass while Alexander's huge dick swung back and forth like a pendulum.
title: Alexander & Riley
